definition: wheel/disk/ring/steamship/to take turns/to rotate/by turn/classifier for big round objects: disk, or recurring events: round, turn
car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159
to reincarnate/reincarnation (Buddhism)/(of the seasons etc) to follow each other cyclically/cycle/CL:個|个[ge4]
variant of 輪迴|轮回[lun2 hui2]
to reincarnate/reincarnation (Buddhism)/(of the seasons etc) to follow each other cyclically/cycle/CL:個|个[ge4]
variant of 輪迴|轮回[lun2 hui2]

sentences.english: Lift up the car , remove wheels .
sentences.chinese: 首先升起汽车，卸下轮榖。

sentences.english: There, awaiting my uneasy embrace, are some five or six skateboards .
sentences.chinese: 那里，五六块轮滑板，正等候我心神不安的拥抱。

sentences.english: Metal-wheeled chariots are the prototype of the tanks of modern warfare.
sentences.chinese: 金属轮战车是现代战争中坦克的原型。

sentences.english: Uses small-diameter wheels, a short wheelbase, and steering mechanism.
sentences.chinese: 使用小直径轮，短轴距，与导向机构。

sentences.english: It is known as the Aajna Chakra in the language of Yoga.
sentences.chinese: 在瑜伽系统中，这里被称为眉心轮。

sentences.english: This puts the swing perpendicular to the wheel and produces the flattest surface.
sentences.chinese: 这使摆动垂直轮和生产平坦的表面。

sentences.english: 14-6 He ran back to the rod and began winding in the reel with steady movements .
sentences.chinese: 他跑回鱼杆处，稳速向回摇绕线轮。

sentences.english: Another marcher switched targets when it was his turn at the bullhorn.
sentences.chinese: 轮到另一名游行者使用扩音器时，他转换了目标。

sentences.english: The paddles above the wheel are covered with fungus and slime.
sentences.chinese: 以上轮桨板满了真菌和泥。

sentences.english: My emotions went up and down the scale like a yo-yo.
sentences.chinese: 当时我的情绪就好象悠悠轮一样忽上忽下。

sentences.english: Taking the wheel of C5 Airscape is a total and continuous experience in driving pleasure.
sentences.chinese: 走碳五鸟瞰轮是在驾驶乐趣和持续的总经验。

sentences.english: The time has finally come for Yannan to retire.
Wish God leads them to the way to reborn…
sentences.chinese: 愿他们能尽快找到轮廻的道路。

sentences.english: She won the championship with a performance of 13-under in the four rounds.
sentences.chinese: 她并以4轮低于标准杆13杆的成绩顺利摘下后冠。

sentences.english: If there is next life, darling, I may be only for the humble round of the beast.
sentences.chinese: 假如有来生，亲爱的，我也许只能轮为卑微的畜生。

sentences.english: This paper presents a roll control scheme for four-wheel steering(4WS) vehicles.
sentences.chinese: 基于4轮转向车辆，提出了一种新的主动抗侧倾方法。

definition: first round or stage (of a match, election, talks, planned policy etc)
in turn/by turns/lap/turn/round/classifier for laps, turns, rounds
threshing floor/classifier for events and happenings: spell, episode, bout
large place used for a specific purpose/stage/scene (of a play)/classifier for sporting or recreational activities/classifier for number of exams
to defeat decisively/to win decisively/great victory/triumph
Lianping county in Heyuan 河源[He2 yuan2], Guangdong
to pit oneself against sb/to compete with sb/contest/battle/to haggle/to quibble
to score a victory/to prevail over one's opponents
